reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Response for HIV and STIs in Madagascar: an approach involving the populations most exposed in zones of vulnerability

description.narrative: Madagascar - HIV - Population Services International - PSI HQ. This program has the following goals: Le nombre de nouvelles infections à VIH est réduit d'au moins 50% dans les populations clés les plus exposées aux risques d'infection à VIH et dans la population générale d'ici fin 2020. La proportion des nourrissons infectés par le VIH nés de mères vivant avec le VIH est réduite à moins de 5% d'ici fin 2020. La survie des adultes et enfants vivant avec le VIH sous ARV 12 mois après l'initiation du TARV est accrue à 95% d'ici fin 2020. The objectives of this program are: Au moins 80% des populations clés les plus exposés et 60% des personnes ayant des rapports hétérosexuels occasionnels, adoptent des comportements et pratiques sexuels à moindre risque d'ici fin 2020. Les risques de transmission sanguine du VIH sont réduits d'au moins 50% d'ici fin 2020. Au moins 60% des femmes en âge de procréer adoptent des pratiques sexuelles qui les protègent contre l'infection à VIH d'ici fin 2020. Au moins 80% des femmes enceintes séropositives bénéficient du paquet de servies pour réduire la transmission du VIH de la mère à l'enfant d'ici fin 2020. Au moins 80% des adultes et enfants vivant avec le VIH bénéficient d'une prise en charge médicale psychologique, sociale et juridique de qualité d'ici fin 2020

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for MDG-H-PSI
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
YP-other 2: Percentage of young people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed during the reporting period
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
GP-other 1: Percentage of target population that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of women and men aged 15+ who received an HIV test and know their results
Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
KP-Other 1 – Percentage of prisoners and people in detention that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
YP-other 1: Percentage of young people reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Impact indicator for MDG-H-PSI
Percentage of people living with HIV
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for MDG-H-PSI
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting condom use at last sex
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Percentage of (estimated) people living with HIV who have been tested HIV-positive
Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
HIV O-Other 1: Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse - young people 15-24 years
